content.question: The excerpt best serves as evidence that, in 1861,

choices.label: citizens in the Northern states did not want Abraham Lincoln as president
citizens in the Southern states were deeply divided over secession
citizens in the Northern states were prepared to accommodate slavery
citizens in the Northern states would not accept a Confederate government

content.answer: citizens in the Southern states were deeply divided over secession

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
